categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order personnel

nodes.text: Dyril was a male maintenance technician at the Q'Maere Research Facility. Formerly a member of the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order, his loyalty came under suspicion and he was sent to the Re-Education branch to be "re-brained". He was part of the staff left behind when Moff Kentor Sarne abandoned the facility. He was partnered with Hoke, and, due to his clumsiness, often created problems that he had to fix.
